post.title: Building a Todo App with React Hooks
post.overview: A step-by-step guide to creating a functional todo app using React functional components and Hooks (useState, useEffect).
post.content:
Introduction

React Hooks let you use state and other React features without writing a class.
post.code:
import React, { useState } from 'react';
const TodoApp = () => { /*...*/ };
post.author: Ashir
